ygData.subject: Re: Clerics
ygData.msgSnippet: If the Butcherblock is to far for some of you clerics the Toxxulia Forest outside Erudin has plenty of skeletons that are perfect for a lv 6 cleric. Might be
ygData.messageBody:
If the Butcherblock is to far for some of you clerics the Toxxulia Forest
outside Erudin has plenty of skeletons that are perfect for a lv 6 cleric.
Might be tough solo but with one other person you would be fine until lv 7-8. I
team up with one cleric all the time, he was of the 6th order and I was was of
the 5th and we had no trouble killing the skeletonss, Kobold Watchers, or Kobold

Shamens. All give xp for this level. The Shamens also give the paw which is a
quest item for clerics, get them and turn them in for items. Just thought I
would let you know, our land doesn\'t see to many visitors. Also the bears in
Qeynos hills are good opponents. On another note another guildmember, Izum the
Providor, a cleric, are currently in the Kerra Plains on our way to adventure.
If any would like to join us just stop us when we run by.

Zakrul the Traveler
Guildmaster of The Companions
Erudite Wizard





-----------------------------------------------------
This mail sent through IMP: http://web.horde.org/imp/
